code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import AlertContext from"../../context/alert/alertContext";export var Alert=function Alert(){var alertContext=useContext(AlertContext);var alert=alertContext.alert;return alert!==null&&React.createElement("div",{className:"alert alert-".concat(alert.type)},React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-info-circle"}),alert.msg);};export default Alert;
